name: Run Hello World Job and Validate UI and CLI Results
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **UI** during onboarding.
- Create new project via **CLI**.
- Run `Hello World` Job via **CLI**.

Verify that:

- Job executed successfully in **CLI**.
- Job is displayed in successful jobs via **UI**.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via UI during onboarding.
  • Create new project via CLI.
  • Run Hello World Job via CLI.

Verify that:

  • Job executed successfully in CLI.
  • Job is displayed in successful jobs via UI.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Run Hello World job via CLI
Message: [Exception] during step: Verify CLI login output
Message: Command timed out after 60 seconds and was killed.
statusTrace:

            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.13.7/x64/lib/python3.13/asyncio/streams.py:730: in read
    await self._wait_for_data('read')
/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.13.7/x64/lib/python3.13/asyncio/streams.py:539: in _wait_for_data

E   asyncio.exceptions.CancelledError

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:

steps.name: Verify Apolo CLI client is installed

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **UI** during onboarding.
- Create new project via **CLI**.
- Run `Hello World` Job via **CLI**.

Verify that:

- Job executed successfully in **CLI**.
- Job is displayed in successful jobs via **UI**.
testStage.descriptionHtml:

  • Create new organization via UI during onboarding.
  • Create new project via CLI.

  • Job is displayed in successful jobs via UI.
